content: sweet and petite this pumpkin looks good enough to eat a tiny little softie for small hands to hold or for fall decor be creative and try some of rhichard devrieze stippled and variegated minis for added flair cut a small twig from fallen timber for the stem or add a snippet of a cinnamon stick or use stash yarn for your tiny little stem please enjoy this free knitting pattern and if you would like future notice of more free patterns follow me at @muskokayarn on instagram and @muskokayarnconnection on facebook
